title: Predators
description: Ducks have a cosmopolitan distribution, and are found on every continent except Antarctica.

title: Diet
description: Ducks eat food sources such as grasses, aquatic plants, fish, insects, small amphibians, worms, and small molluscs.

title: Taxonomy
description: All ducks belong to the biological order Anseriformes, a group that contains the ducks, geese and swans, as well as the screamers, and the magpie goose.
